abstract: Stocks rebound from significant early losses, with energy shares closing only slightly down for day.
lead_paragraph: Crude oil prices tumbled again after posting solid gains last week, but the major indexes showed only small losses or gains.

headline.main: Market Mostly Lower After Energy Sector Drop
headline.print_headline: Market Mostly Lower After Energy Sector Drop

snippet: Crude oil prices tumbled again after posting solid gains last week, but the major indexes showed only small losses or gains.
